a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of the total land area burnt by wildfires each year, 2012 to 2025
The total area consumed by wildfires is recorded for each fire event, even if fires occur in the same location
multiple times. The 2025 data is incomplete and was last updated 09 January 2025.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2025); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024)
